welcomePage.title: Circles - soon...
welcomePage.intro:
Soon you'll be able to access my favourite hobby project called Circles.
In this app you can organise events and share your experiences with your friends.
Be sure to check back later..

accountPage.text: In this section you will have an option to add a short introduction, list your interests or any information you would like to share. Stay tuned.

myGroupsPage.intro: These are the groups you have created or joined so far. You may add new posts and events to them, or browse posts and events created by your friends.

groupDetailsPage.introPost: These are the group’s latest posts. Click ‘More’ for further posts and interactions.
groupDetailsPage.introEvent: These are the group’s upcoming events. Click ‘More’ for further events and interactions.
groupDetailsPage.introAlbum: These are the group’s albums. Click ‘More’ for further albums and interactions.
